metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10650 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A deserialization flaw was discovered in jackson-databind through 2.9.10.4.It could allow an unauthenticated user to perform code execution viaignite-jta or quartz-core:org.apache.ignite.cache.jta.jndi.CacheJndiTmLookup,org.apache.ignite.cache.jta.jndi.CacheJndiTmFactory, andorg.quartz.utils.JNDIConnectionProvider.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
